dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S3007 IS: Ensuring Enhanced Access to Primary Care Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Klobuchar (for herself and Mr. Heinrich) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to extend the application of the Medicare payment rate floor to primary care services furnished under Medicaid and to apply the rate floor to additional providers of primary care services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring Enhanced Access to Primary Care Act.

section.header: Extension of application of Medicare payment rate floor to primary care services furnished under Medicaid and application to additional providers

subsection.text: Section 1902(a)(13)(C) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396a(a)(13)(C)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking in 2013 and 2014 and inserting on or after January 1, 2013, and before January 1, 2017,; and
by inserting neurology, psychiatry, obstetrics and gynecology, after general internal medicine,.

subsection.text: Section 1905(dd) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396d(dd)) is amended by striking January 1, 2015 and inserting January 1, 2017.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to items and services furnished on or after the first day of the first calendar quarter that begins after the date of the enactment of this Act.
